biotools.summary: Instead of classifying a gene as core or dispensable, QUOD (Reference-based QUantification Of gene-Dispensability) assigns a dispensability score to each gene. Hence, QUOD facilitates the identification of candidate dispensable genes which often underlie lineage-specific adaptation to varying environmental conditions.

bioschemas.name: QUOD
